instruction.2: 2. Find in General tab -> signature section
instruction.3: 3. Create new signature or edit existing one
instruction.4: 4. Fill in the form in Footer Template App and click "Copy to clipboard" button
instruction.5: 5. Paste copied footer into Gmail settings and set signature defaults
instruction.6: 6. Remember to save changes at the bottom of settings
